name: Illustrated War News, Dec. 23, 1914, page 38, complete, partial restoration

desc.html:
Images of Darwan Sing Negi and "British Gunners in Action at the Front", from page 38 of the December 23, 1914 Illustrated War News. The individual images are available below. The images have been restored (although the extracts may have had slightly more work done) but most of the blank paper has not, however, as this is colour adjusted more or less exactly right for the ink used, it's somewhat important in case someone wants the entire page.

Note: The blue-green colour is accurate; the Illustrated War News appears to have used a variety of inks; I'm not sure if this represents the apparently varied printing processes they used, or what.

tags: images from the illustrated war news
